body:
Does it look like a good idea to extend #2275 by introducing 'prepend-path' keyword for compilers.yaml (yes, let's just integrate the whole lmod =)?

For example, that could help to tell Intel compiler to use particular binutils. Unfortunately, just setting environment variables is not enough for this: https://software.intel.com/en-us/comment/1910316
title: Allow compiler wrapper to prepend-path
